entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Leonard
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 mm. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022
